charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1101_0100_2:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking
around Pasio, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a shriek of terror.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1101_0200_2:
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="He" F="She" ] ran to where the voice was coming from and
saw Hala facing off with two masked Trainers!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0401_0400_1: Hmph! We’ll let you off the hook today...
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0402_0600_1: Hmph! We’ll let you off the hook today...
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_0700_1: But we’ll get you next time! Just wait and see!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_0800_1:
*sigh* Learn from your mistakes. Don’t cause any
more trouble, you hear me?
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1300_1:
I can see from the look on your face that you’re
worried about something.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1400_1:
Could it be that you came running here after
hearing someone scream?
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1500_1:
If so, fear not! It was those Team Break members
who screamed, not me.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1600_1: Crabominable and I were just scolding them a bit.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1700_1: My apologies if that made you worry.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1800_1:
Actually, Team Break once tried to steal
Crabominable from me.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_1900_1:
But good old Crabominable starting using some
trees as a punching bag, and that spooked them
so much that they ran away.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_2000_2:
Since then, whenever Crabominable sees a
member of Team Break, he’s quick to challenge
them to a battle!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_2100_1:
And of course, I’m not one to stop something
like that.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0401_2300_1:
As the Island Kahuna, it’s my duty to help solve
problems that happen on the island. And it’s the
same here on Pasio as it is back in Alola.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0402_2500_1:
Never fear. Together, Crabominable and I are
unstoppable!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_2600_1: Plus, I think it’s the right thing to do.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_2700_1:
In order to protect the peace of this island so you
children can enjoy your time here...
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_2800_1:
I will handily throw anyone causing trouble right
out of the ring!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_3100_1:
I can sense a strong will to fight in you—the same
one you get when you find a member of
Team Break.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0401_3300_1:
Wahaha! It looks like Crabominable just wants to
have a friendly match with you!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0402_3500_1:
Wahaha! It looks like Crabominable just wants to
have a friendly match with you!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_3600_1:
Perhaps there’s something about you that is making
him think you’ll be a good opponent.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_3700_1:
Hmm... I also think I could get to know you better
if we had a no-holds-barred match!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_3800_1: Would you like to battle with us sometime soon?
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0401_4000_1: Very well! I’m looking forward to it!
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_0402_4200_1: Very well! I’m looking forward to it.
charaepi_ch0161_00_hara/2301_1201_4300_1:
We’ll polish up our moves to prepare for a
showdown with you, too!
